verses.verse: Come near, <S%H7126><s%> ye nations, <S%H1471><s%> to hear; <S%H8085><s%> and hearken, <S%H7181><s%> ye people: <S%H3816><s%> let the earth <S%H776><s%> hear, <S%H8085><s%> and all that is therein; <S%H4393><s%> the world, <S%H8398><s%> and all things <S%H3605><s%> that come forth <S%H6631><s%> of it.

For <S%H3588><s%> the indignation <S%H7110><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> is upon <S%H5921><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> nations, <S%H1471><s%> and his fury <S%H2534><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> their armies: <S%H6635><s%> he hath utterly destroyed <S%H2763><s%> them, he hath delivered <S%H5414><s%> them to the slaughter. <S%H2874><s%>

Their slain <S%H2491><s%> also shall be cast out, <S%H7993><s%> and their stink <S%H889><s%> shall come up <S%H5927><s%> out of their carcasses, <S%H6297><s%> and the mountains <S%H2022><s%> shall be melted <S%H4549><s%> with their blood. <S%H4480><s%> <S%H1818><s%>

And all <S%H3605><s%> the host <S%H6635><s%> of heaven <S%H8064><s%> shall be dissolved, <S%H4743><s%> and the heavens <S%H8064><s%> shall be rolled together <S%H1556><s%> as a scroll: <S%H5612><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> their host <S%H6635><s%> shall fall down, <S%H5034><s%> as the leaf <S%H5929><s%> falleth off <S%H5034><s%> from the vine, <S%H4480><s%> <S%H1612><s%> and as a falling <S%H5034><s%> fig from the fig tree. <S%H4480><s%> <S%H8384><s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> my sword <S%H2719><s%> shall be bathed <S%H7301><s%> in heaven: <S%H8064><s%> behold, <S%H2009><s%> it shall come down <S%H3381><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> Idumea, <S%H123><s%> and upon <S%H5921><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> of my curse, <S%H2764><s%> to judgment. <S%H4941><s%>

The sword <S%H2719><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> is filled <S%H4390><s%> with blood, <S%H1818><s%> it is made fat <S%H1878><s%> with fatness, <S%H4480><s%> <S%H2459><s%> and with the blood <S%H4480><s%> <S%H1818><s%> of lambs <S%H3733><s%> and goats, <S%H6260><s%> with the fat <S%H4480><s%> <S%H2459><s%> of the kidneys <S%H3629><s%> of rams: <S%H352><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> hath a sacrifice <S%H2077><s%> in Bozrah, <S%H1224><s%> and a great <S%H1419><s%> slaughter <S%H2874><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of Idumea. <S%H123><s%>

And the unicorns <S%H7214><s%> shall come down <S%H3381><s%> with <S%H5973><s%> them, and the bullocks <S%H6499><s%> with <S%H5973><s%> the bulls; <S%H47><s%> and their land <S%H776><s%> shall be soaked <S%H7301><s%> with blood, <S%H4480><s%> <S%H1818><s%> and their dust <S%H6083><s%> made fat <S%H1878><s%> with fatness. <S%H4480><s%> <S%H2459><s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> it is the day <S%H3117><s%> of the LORD's <S%H3068><s%> vengeance, <S%H5359><s%> and the year <S%H8141><s%> of recompenses <S%H7966><s%> for the controversy <S%H7379><s%> of Zion. <S%H6726><s%>

And the streams <S%H5158><s%> thereof shall be turned <S%H2015><s%> into pitch, <S%H2203><s%> and the dust <S%H6083><s%> thereof into brimstone, <S%H1614><s%> and the land <S%H776><s%> thereof shall become <S%H1961><s%> burning <S%H1197><s%> pitch. <S%H2203><s%>

It shall not <S%H3808><s%> be quenched <S%H3518><s%> night <S%H3915><s%> nor day; <S%H3119><s%> the smoke <S%H6227><s%> thereof shall go up <S%H5927><s%> forever: <S%H5769><s%> from generation <S%H4480><s%> <S%H1755><s%> to generation <S%H1755><s%> it shall lie waste; <S%H2717><s%> none <S%H369><s%> shall pass through <S%H5674><s%> it forever <S%H5331><s%> and ever. <S%H5331><s%>

But the cormorant <S%H6893><s%> and the bittern <S%H7090><s%> shall possess <S%H3423><s%> it; the owl <S%H3244><s%> also and the raven <S%H6158><s%> shall dwell <S%H7931><s%> in it: and he shall stretch out <S%H5186><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> it the line <S%H6957><s%> of confusion, <S%H8414><s%> and the stones <S%H68><s%> of emptiness. <S%H922><s%>

They shall call <S%H7121><s%> the nobles <S%H2715><s%> thereof to the kingdom, <S%H4410><s%> but none <S%H369><s%> shall be there, <S%H8033><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> her princes <S%H8269><s%> shall be <S%H1961><s%> nothing. <S%H657><s%>

And thorns <S%H5518><s%> shall come up <S%H5927><s%> in her palaces, <S%H759><s%> nettles <S%H7057><s%> and brambles <S%H2336><s%> in the fortresses <S%H4013><s%> thereof: and it shall be <S%H1961><s%> a habitation <S%H5116><s%> of dragons, <S%H8565><s%> and a court <S%H2681><s%> for owls. <S%H1323><s%> <S%H3284><s%>

The wild beasts of the desert <S%H6728><s%> shall also meet <S%H6298><s%> with <S%H854><s%> the wild beasts of the island, <S%H338><s%> and the satyr <S%H8163><s%> shall cry <S%H7121><s%> to <S%H5921><s%> his fellow; <S%H7453><s%> the screech owl <S%H3917><s%> also <S%H389><s%> shall rest <S%H7280><s%> there, <S%H8033><s%> and find <S%H4672><s%> for herself a place of rest. <S%H4494><s%>

There <S%H8033><s%> shall the great owl <S%H7091><s%> make her nest, <S%H7077><s%> and lay, <S%H4422><s%> and hatch, <S%H1234><s%> and gather <S%H1716><s%> under her shadow: <S%H6738><s%> there <S%H8033><s%> shall the vultures <S%H1772><s%> also <S%H389><s%> be gathered, <S%H6908><s%> every one <S%H802><s%> with her mate. <S%H7468><s%>

Seek <S%H1875><s%> ye out of <S%H4480><s%> <S%H5921><s%> the book <S%H5612><s%> of the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> and read: <S%H7121><s%> no <S%H3808><s%> one <S%H259><s%> of these <S%H4480><s%> <S%H2007><s%> shall fail, <S%H5737><s%> none <S%H3808><s%> <S%H802><s%> shall want <S%H6485><s%> her mate: <S%H7468><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> my mouth <S%H6310><s%> it <S%H1931><s%> hath commanded, <S%H6680><s%> and his spirit <S%H7307><s%> it <S%H1931><s%> hath gathered <S%H6908><s%> them.

And he <S%H1931><s%> hath cast <S%H5307><s%> the lot <S%H1486><s%> for them, and his hand <S%H3027><s%> hath divided <S%H2505><s%> it unto them by line: <S%H6957><s%> they shall possess <S%H3423><s%> it forever, <S%H5704><s%> <S%H5769><s%> from generation <S%H1755><s%> to generation <S%H1755><s%> shall they dwell <S%H7931><s%> therein.
